issues.title: Remove javax.enterprise.event.Observer
use the latest TCK suite for webbeans-tck
remove old rules and formattings for handling of beans.xml
@Stateful EJBs have to be handled as being passivation capable
OWB crashes while parsing methods with generic parameters
OWB crashes on creating disposer method
Conversation.isLongRunning() was removed in favor of Conversation.isTransient()
If an injection point declares no qualifier, then @Default should be assumed.
Decorator matching looks for all bean qualifiers in the list of delegate qualifiers
upgrade OWB TCK from webbeans to weld
A new extract of openwebbeans on a fresh system has difficulty resolving dependencies and repositories.
component->comp typo interceptor stack copy
create a test case for the BeforeShutDown event
BeforeShutDown (in current code) should be BeforeShutdown to match spec.
remove ActivityManager from OWB
@New needs a value parameter for the Class it should create
javax.enterprise.inject.spi.Decorator#getDelegateBindings() must be renamed to getDelegateQualifiers();
remove Bean#getDeploymentType()
Conversation#isLongRunning() logic must be converted to isTransient();
ProcessSessionBean SPI interface needs to be updated to the latest spec
Interceptors register all annotations as Interceptor Bindings
interceptor stack does not honor beans.xml ordering
interceptor/bean binding relationship is inverted in WebBeansInterceptor.hasBinding()
interceptor bindings at class-level added to stack twice
Producer fields do not honor generics

Conversations are not scoped to a particular session
Missing bean interception stack during TagHandler expression evaluation
Interceptor bindings, that are defined on stereotypes are not applied to beans

CID during GET requests must be set on UIViewRoot earlier than before render response
Producer field type that is a type variable leads to a NPE rather than definition error (Section 3.4)
Singleton context is not set as ThreadLocal on every request
SingletonContext not available in in multithreaded SE environments, which use the StandaloneLifeCycle
InterceptionType.AROUND_TIMEOUT is missing
PluginLoader need to actually startUp each plugin at load time
remove e.printStackTrace() and use proper logging
TCK requires to create newInstance of hidden constructors
Even if @PreDestroy is used in an Interceptor, it doesn't need an InvoicationContext parameter

@Interceptors-defined interceptors run after JCDI interceptors
Bean Api Types Does not contain Object.class
Bug in ProducerMethod primitive return type resolution
@Type annotation does not work correctly
@New must use its value field while creating New bean
proxies only get injected for the 1st instance of a bean
<interceptors> may now be defined in multiple beans.xml
the atinject-tck must use our genonimo-cdi interface instead of javax.inject:javax.inject
creating a proxy fails for beans which have the same interface defined multiple times in their declaration chain

after leaving the incubator a new location for the site needs to be configured
IllegalStateException must be thrown on Already Begin or End Conversations
we need to destroy() our Contextual instances on a Conversation timeout

handle errors set via AfterBeanDiscovery#addDefinitionError

check on existing conversation is missing in Conversation#begin(String id)

Caching of Bean Proxies
